definition: to exceed/to overtake/to surpass/to transcend/to pass/to cross/ultra-/super-
large place used for a specific purpose/stage/scene (of a play)/classifier for sporting or recreational activities/classifier for number of exams
threshing floor/classifier for events and happenings: spell, episode, bout

sentences.english: Our packing is in Chinese national style , and suitable for display in super-market.
sentences.chinese: 我們的包裝具有中國民族風格，適於在超級市場陳列。

sentences.english: Every week on P-Day I go to the supermarket.
sentences.chinese: 我每個預備天都會去超級市場。

sentences.english: Other Royal Supermarket terms and conditions apply (Available in Traditional Chinese only ).
sentences.chinese: 須受其他來來超級市場條款及細則約束。

sentences.english: Supermarkets may be temples of worship for the members of the congregation.
sentences.chinese: 超級市場對會衆成員來說可能是崇拜的聖殿。

sentences.english: The little grocery shop is losing all its customers to the new supermarket.
sentences.chinese: 那個小雜貨店的顧客都跑到新開的超級市場上去了。

sentences.english: There are many kinds of tomato juice in the supermarket now.
sentences.chinese: 現在超級市場有許多種的蕃茄汁。

sentences.english: The whole supermarket was ruined in a great fire.
sentences.chinese: 整個超級市場被一場大火燒掉。

sentences.english: To supplement his ordinary income. Ivan did a part-time job in a supermarket.
sentences.chinese: 爲了補充平時的收入，依凡在一家超級市場兼職。

sentences.english: My wife badgered me to take her to the super market store.
sentences.chinese: 我的妻子吵着要我帶她去超級市場。

sentences.english: If you do not wish to receive promotional emails from T&T Supermarket, please unsubscribe by clicking here.
sentences.chinese: 如你不希望收到大統華超級市場的網訊，請按此處。

sentences.english: Name three things that you can buy in the supermarket.
sentences.chinese: 請說出三種你可以在超級市場購買的東西。

sentences.english: Transit workers and supermarket employees began wearing masks.
sentences.chinese: 搬運工和超級市場員工開始戴口罩。

sentences.english: The supermarket near our school will be reopened soon.
sentences.chinese: 我們學校附近的那個超級市場不久將重新開業。

sentences.english: Free League Supermarket is a chain supermarket in Taoyuan and Miaoli.
sentences.chinese: 是桃竹地區的連鎖超級市場。

sentences.english: Furious, the husband phoned the supermarket in the expectation of refuting his wife.
sentences.chinese: 惱怒的丈夫立即給超級市場打電話，準備駁斥妻子。

sentences.english: These ten-dollar shirts are now on sale for five.
sentences.chinese: 我們的產品各超級市場都在出售。

definition: market/store/mall (usually specializing in a particular product category such as furniture)
shopping mall/shopping center/department store/emporium/CL:家[jia1]/the business world
to procure (for an enterprise etc)/to purchase
to purchase/to buy/to do one's shopping/purchasing agent/buyer
